name: GemShoppingNetwork
0:
”Alexa, open Gem Shopping”
”Alexa, start Gem Shopping”
”Alexa, launch Gem Shopping”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gem shopping
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Gem Shopping Network app allows you to watch our 24/7 show on your favorite devices. We have a unique and incredible variety of high-quality jewelry that you can get for amazing prices. On our app, you can watch our stream live, find a piece you love, and then call in to bid, make an offer, or simply buy it outright. See something you like on our turntables? Well you can also call in just to ask to see a specific piece or learn more about it. Since, we're live 24/7 you can take the time to find the piece that's as unique as you are - we promise you’ll find that special something. 

The more you watch the more you’ll find to love. 

For more details you can go to gemshopping.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
